item.description:
Please join Karla & Rufus, Andrea & Darby, at Castle Island

When: Sunday, Oct. 23 @ 11:00 a.m.
Where: Castle Island, Day Blvd., South Boston, MA
Directions: Rte. 3 to JFK Exit, follow beach along William J. Day Boulevard, Castle Island is at the end of the Causeway.

I will be monitoring the discussion board up until the meetup if you have any questions/comments.

We hope you can join us. See you there.

Karla & Rufus

Andrea & Darby
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of Sullivan's, a restaurant with picnic tables outside, right near the entrance to Castle Island.

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: October Meetup for Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA
